General.Name: Blender Financial Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Blender Financial Technologies Ltd. provides financing solutions in Israel and internationally. It offers banking, loans, car finance, payment, and investment services. The company was formerly known as V-Financial Technologies Ltd. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Boaz  Aviv
1.Title: Deputy CEO, Head of Technology & Director
